title: Loading into a game
body: Ever since I updated the patch when ever I load a game my screen is black and only shows ping for the first minute. Is there a way to fix?

replies.body: Absolutely!  This black screen usually happens if your connection is struggling to reach the game server.  You'll want to go over each step of the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to fix that up.  Let me know if you have any questions!
